name: bigquery-chat-app
description: Full-stack agentic chat application for Google BigQuery

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=backend && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=mcp-server
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=backend" "npm run dev --workspace=frontend" "npm run dev --workspace=mcp-server"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run sync:frontend-assets
